name: Cleaning House (TWU Game Development)
description:
Cleaning House

Cleaning House is an adventure game with a hybrid collection of minigames that allows players to step into the shoes of a janitor at the Red Clover Casino, who has been forced into service to pay off the debts he has accumulated from his detrimental gambling habits. After a long, grueling day of work, you are able to go use the machines and tables to attempt to level out your debt and also explore the mysteries of the various floors of the casino.

Made for Game 390/490 & 391/491, Fall 2021 & Spring 2022

Caleb Millard (Lead Developer + Coder)

Logan Smith (Project Manager + Artist)

Sean Fan (Lead Designer + Playtester)

Ben Tigchelaar (Narrative Lead + Yarnspinner Tech)

Anthony Nootebos (Lead Sound Designer + Composer)

Jessi Nickel (Creative Lead + Artist)

Kaelyn Cline (Artist + UI/UX Designer)

Nic Perez (Artist)
